mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.del_flag, a.fsf_yhm, a.fsf_yhid, a.fsf_yhxm, a.fsf_yhks
LEFT JOIN ex_his_depart_inf b ON b.fsf_ksbh = a.fsf_yhks
LEFT JOIN sys_depart c ON b.spd_depart_id = c.id
mapper.select:
SELECT , ,
FROM ex_his_user_inf a
where 1=1 AND a.del_flag =#{entity.DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.id = #{entity.id}
AND a.fsf_yhxm LIKE concat('%',#{entity.userName},'%')
AND (b.fsf_ksmc LIKE concat('%',#{entity.departName},'%') or a.fsf_yhks LIKE concat('%',#{entity.departName},'%'))
order by a.create_time desc
